data.actual_result: You're unable to exit full screen mode and are forced to disconnect from the voice channel
data.expected_result: After going to full screen you're able to exit full screen
data.short_description: Full screening while screensharing in a server makes every button unresponsive forcing you to disconnect
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel on a server with screenshare - Start screensharing - Click on the server name on the RTC modal on the bottom above your name to open the screenshare - Go to fullscreen mode on the screenshare - Attempt to click the button to exit full screen
